body_html:
@benoitsteiner Another friendly request to look at this. To be clear, the bug we are talking about is that the offsets of extract_glimpse are not working as expected.

I reproduced the bug using this slightly larger example and I got this output. I cannot make sense of it, and it becomes less clear when trying other input sizes (e.g. 4x4). Also I believe that the bug is also present when the indices are floating point and normalized=True.

Note that there is also an issue open on StackOverflow.
